title: Last Bosses in Heroless Worlds - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Comedy   Drama   Ecchi   Fantasy   Harem   Romance   Sci-fi   Supernatural
tags: Aliens   Alternate World   Artificial Intelligence   Death   Demi-Humans   Fallen Angels   Fantasy World   Game Elements   Heroes   Male Protagonist   Monsters   Multiple Transported Individuals   Sword And Magic   Tragic Past
author: Yanagimi Touki   柳実冬貴
description: Six extremely powerful 'last bosses' (a rogue AI, a mad scientist, a fallen angel, a battle junkie hero, an alien queen and a mutant/abnormal ) who had caused large amounts of destruction in their worlds due to various circumstances before being defeated are summoned by a mysterious girl who wants to make them save various worlds.>
